{{Wired embedded system |brand=DrayTek |model=Vigor 3900 |asin=B00PUMTRSE |is_manuf=No |est_release_date=10/2012 |type=router |pwr_conn=C13 |cpu1_brand=Freescale (NXP) |cpu1_model=M83263G13;QorIQ, LS102MA; |cpu1_cspeed=650 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX30LF4G28AB-TI |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W971GG6KB-25 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, SFP |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sfp_num=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model= |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=4 }} {{TagLine|Quad-WAN VPN Gateway/Broadband Router}} :[https://www.draytek.com/products/vigor3900/ Product page]
===Hardware=== *CPU: [[NXP]] M83263G13 (QorIQ LS102MA), 2x @650MHz (ARM 1136) *WAN: 4x 1GbE ports (RJ-45), 1x active fiber (SFP) slot *LAN: 2x 1GbE ports (RJ-45), 1x active fiber (SFP) slot *USB: 2x USB 2.0 (Host) ports *Console: 1x console port (RJ-45) *Reset: 1x factory reset button
===See also=== :;[[DrayTek]] *[[DrayTek Vigor 3200]] • *[[DrayTek Vigor 3900]] • *[[DrayTek Vigor 3910]] • [https://www.techradar.com/reviews/draytek-vigor3910 Review]
